resources.string:
To start downloading songs for free from gaana.com songs database, follow these steps:
 1. Run Gaana android app.
 2. Choose a song to be dowloaded but do not start playing it yet.
 3. Come back in Gaana Downloader app and click on "Start Intercepting" button.
 4. Go back to Gaana android app without pressing back and start playing the song you need to download.
 5. Just wait for this app to show a download complete notification.
 6. Play and enjoy your song.
